question: Match the Column-I with Column-II and choose the correct option:
Column-I (Characteristics): a. Radial, tetrarch..., b. Conjoint, open and endarch, c. Radial, polyarch..., d. Conjoint, closed...
Column-II (TS): i. T.S of monocot stem, ii. T.S of dicot root, iii. T.S of dicot stem, iv. T.S of dicot stem
explanation: Radial/Tetrarch = Dicot Root (ii); Conjoint/Open = Dicot Stem (iii/iv); Radial/Polyarch = Monocot Root (iii/iv error in list?); Conjoint/Closed = Monocot Stem (i). The key maps to Option 2 [cite: 364-367, 480].
